oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Evin Knudson's Commanders book
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Commanders book that belonged to Evin Knudson. The book contains cartes de visite of officers in his chain of command in the Union Army. Cartes de visite of Abraham Lincoln, Ulysses S. Grant, William T. Sherman, and Vice President Andrew Johnson are included.
